title: A Conversation with Professor Noam Chomsky Part 2
description:
This Q&A session is a follow-up to "A Conversation with Professor Noam Chomsky," a New York City Bar Association program that took place on April 13, 2023 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrN5CWFWAVw
 
Professor Noam Chomsky is the author of more than 150 books, Professor Emeritus at Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Laureate Professor of Linguistics at the University of Arizona.
